Language.String: Eine Soft-SPS nach IEC 61131-3 f√ºr Linux/ARM64-basierte Industriesteuerungen. CODESYS Control basiert auf CODESYS SDK 3.5.20.40, Release .

DeviceInfo.Name: CODESYS Control for Linux ARM64 SL
DeviceInfo.Description: An IEC 61131-3-compliant SoftPLC for Linux/ARM64-based industrial controllers. CODESYS Control based on CODESYS SDK 3.5.20.40, Release

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called before application starts. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called after application starts. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called before application stops. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called after application stops. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called before application reset. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called after application reset. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called before application online change. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called after application online change. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called before application download. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called after application online download. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called before application is exited. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Event is sent after CodeInit. Is called inside the task safe section and only at online-change! (e.g. the copy code for online-change is executed here). Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Event is sent, if an exception occurred in the context of an application. Context=Exception task or exception task itself. Debugging=Depends on the task

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Login of a client in this application. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Logout of a client in this application. Context=Communication task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called before reading inputs. Context=IEC task. Debugging=Enabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called after reading inputs. Context=IEC task. Debugging=Enabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called before writing outputs. Context=IEC task. Debugging=Enabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Called after writing outputs. Context=IEC task. Debugging=Enabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Event is sent cyclically in the debug loop, if the IEC task is halted on a breakpoint. Context=IEC task. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Event is sent right before shutdown of the runtime system. Context=RTS Main loop. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Event is sent before exit the communication servers during shutdown. Context=RTS Main loop. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: description
ts:setting.ts:value: Event is sent before exit all tasks during shutdown. Context=RTS Main loop. Debugging=Disabled

ts:setting.name: priority-0
ts:setting.ts:value: highest realtime priority above IRQs (SCHED FIFO 56)

ts:setting.name: priority-5
ts:setting.ts:value: lowest realtime priority above IRQs (SCHED FIFO 51)

ts:setting.name: priority-6
ts:setting.ts:value: realtime priority equal to IRQs (SCHED FIFO 50)

ts:setting.name: priority-7
ts:setting.ts:value: highest realtime priority below IRQs (SCHED FIFO 49)

ts:setting.name: priority-15
ts:setting.ts:value: lowest realtime priority below IRQs (SCHED FIFO 41)

ts:setting.name: priority-16
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-15)

ts:setting.name: priority-17
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-14)

ts:setting.name: priority-18
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-13)

ts:setting.name: priority-19
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-12)

ts:setting.name: priority-20
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-11)

ts:setting.name: priority-21
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-10)

ts:setting.name: priority-22
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-9)

ts:setting.name: priority-23
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-8)

ts:setting.name: priority-24
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-7)

ts:setting.name: priority-25
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-6)

ts:setting.name: priority-26
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-5)

ts:setting.name: priority-27
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-4)

ts:setting.name: priority-28
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-3)

ts:setting.name: priority-29
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-2)

ts:setting.name: priority-30
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(-1)

ts:setting.name: priority-31
ts:setting.ts:value: low linux default priority (SCHED OTHER 20) + nice(0)
